content:
#13886

This contains adaptations for the change to simp normal form for List lookup, as previously discussed at https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/428973-nightly-testing/topic/change.20to.20simp.20normal.20form.20for.20.60List.60.20lookup

It's a big PR, touching 48 files.

I'll have more changes to the List API all this week (although hopefully much less disruptive: adding lemmas, but without many changes to simp normal forms), so there's more to come building on this soon!
